responses: 0.5: The HOS and HOG share equal power.
citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
notes: If the head of state is also head of government, v2ex_hogw is 1.
question: Does the head of government HOG have more relative power than the head of state HOS over the appointment and dismissal of cabinet ministers?
name: v2ex_hogw
